website_summaries.verdict: A one-piece swimsuit that's just as cute as a two-piece and available in a variety of sizes.
pros: Available in 10 different cute designs in sizes 2 to 14
Includes built-in sun protection with SPF 50
The suits tend to be true to size and comfortable to wear
cons: The colors can fade fairly quickly after a couple of washes

customer_reviews.title: Get it! So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this because it didn’t qualify for free returns, and I couldn’t see it in person before purchasing. I am very happy with my purchase! The suit is very well made and fits my toddler perfectly. She’s 2 years old, in the 96th percentile for height and weight, and I ordered a 2/3t.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. The colors are way more vibrant (think hot pink) than the picture shows. I ordered a 7/8 for my 6 year old because reviews said it runs small. It was too big so I returned it and am waiting for a 5/6 to be stocked so I can reorder it.
customer_reviews.author: roxykargisize

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and cut.  Can't go wrong w/this one!
customer_reviews.text: I see that some customer's had the ruffles arrive in a hot pink. Ours arrived just as pictures with the coral ruffles. The bathing suit is absolutely adorable. The colors are vibrant and the cut is just perfect for a little swimmer! I ordered a 4-5 size for my 3yo daugher because she's tall for her age 91st percentile and I'm hoping it'll fit next year too. Love, love, love this suit for her swim lessons
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great suits so far
customer_reviews.text: These bathing suits are beautiful. My daughter wanted matching one for her baby sister. It’s not easy finding Their sizes and anything matching. They seem to run A little small because my youngest where is an 18 month clothes And the 2/3 fit her perfectly. My oldest wears a size 8 but it was a little small on her and when I ordered the 9/10 and it fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: This suit runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I find that the sizing is different than US sizing, They were sizing the suit according to the age of the child and not by weight or inches. So I bought a 11-12 because my Grand-daughter will soon turn 11 and I figured it would fit her next year as well. She tried the 11-12 on and it was tight across the back. I have re-ordered it in a 13-14 and hopefully it will fit .
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Heisler

customer_reviews.title: Fashion at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: This is my six year old's favorite swimsuit and it is absolutely adorable. It faded a little after being in the chlorine quite a bit, but other than that it as held up for two seasons of swimming(it was a little on the larger end when I first ordered but now it fits perfectly). The little ruffles at the top are a cute addition. Very fashionable swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fabric
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bathing suit. I don't think it fits all that well- the top kind of gaps even though the straps are adjusted correctly, and there is bagginess on her slim torso in the back. But who cares- she's happy and has been wearing it often, and the fabric seems like it will hold up well. The pattern is also very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Always need somethingTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my daughter for her birthday and it is SO cute! I wish it came in my size. It fits her true to size and it is really flattering. Edit to say: The suit is starting to lose its color. She has been wearing it often, maybe two or three times a week since we got it about a month ago. It’s still beautiful but it’s not what it was when we first got it. I ordered a second one for my other daughter and there is quite a difference. Edit again: it’s quite faded, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bathing suit but the crotch area is baggy on ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable bathing suit but the crotch area is baggy on my daughter and the leg holes are huge for her long skinny legs so I’m worried her lady bits will show at some point come summer time. We still have a few months so I’m going to see if she fits in it better come this summer instead of returning it because I love the swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: So cute and fits well!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, my daughter says this is her new favorite swimsuit. It fits perfectly, and we have a hard time finding swimsuits that fit her well because she is thin and very tall for her age (3'8" and 42 lbs, just turned 5). I'll definitely buy more in other colors and patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Cute Suit
customer_reviews.text: We love the vibrant colors of this suit. We purchased the navy with teal ruffles. My daughter is between sizes so it is very hard to find a bathing suit that fits her properly. She's 11 and very petite. We've purchased many bathing sits in the 10-12 range that were way too big, however the 7-8's are too small. The 8-10 option of this suit worked so well for her. My only issue is that the teal ruffles ended up with hot pink dye patches on it. Doesn't bother us much since it's just a swim suit. Just the only "issue" we've had.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hasn't worn it yet to the pool but the fit is great and the style is very flattering. She loves it. It seems to be good quality so i expect it to last through the summer. I will update if it does not.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these suits for my girls ages 7, 4, and 2 for a beach vacation and they were perfect. They do fade a bit but they are so very cute and fit really well!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cute swimming suite
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 years old, 50% height and weight. Size 7-8 is perfect for her with a little room to grow into. No need to buy one size up.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagolady

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking swimsuits
customer_reviews.text: Last month, I cannot find many girls’ swimsuits available in store when my daughter need a new one. So I searched and found more choices here. My daughter likes the style. The only concern for me is the size. My daughter is 7yo old. After checking the size chart, I think 7-8 size might be a little bit big. So I took the smaller one. Actually 5-6 is just perfect when my daughter put it on. A satisfied purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The colors are vibrant and beautiful, and it's so cute! It is a little large, but I knew I was ordering bigger. She's in between sizes, and I wanted to make sure it would fit. Because of that, the straps will occasionally fall down, and it's a little big in the seat. She may be able to wear it next summer too! It's one of the prettiest suits I have seen, and everyone compliments it.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a 10/12 but just barely. She is thin so we ordered a 7/8 in this suit thinking it would probably fit her better. Fits perfectly and she loves it. Seems like a nice quality suit and we are very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Sui
customer_reviews.text: This suit fits perfect and looks adorable on my 9 year old granddaughter. Not baby-ish at all and not too revealing for her age. The fabric is good quality. I ordered the size for 11-12 years old. She is 9 and normally wears between a size 8-10. I usually size up on swimsuits. So cute my daughter bought her the same suit in a different print.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Macintire

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit for my daughter. Adorable design and vibrant colors. The only thing I suggest is go a size up if your child is thicker/stocky. My daughter is normally a 2T but needed a 3T as she is a solid girl. But I love this suit and will be buying a size up to use next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, bright colors. Great quality. My daughter is a fairly tall and lean 5 year old and the 5/6 fit well with some room to spare, which will be perfect for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Patry

customer_reviews.title: The straps are connected to the bathing suit with flimsy hard plastic rings
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is really cute. My daughter has a few with similar designs. But, this one is horrible. The back straps are held on to the suit by a cheap, hard and brittle "O" ring. It snaps as soon as you put it on. I bought one and it was broken before my daughter even put it on. Returned it and the new one was okay until she put it on. Snapped. Returned it and will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Darling suits
customer_reviews.text: My daughters wanted matching swimsuits and they love these! The top is pink on the younger daughter and coral on the older, but they actually liked them being different so it's not a complaint. Both colors look great and the quality seems good
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Super cute bathing suit, bright colors
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old picked this suit out of all the others. It fits her perfectly. The colors are bright and vibrant. It is prettier in person. We received this suit faster than anticipated. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Celena Miller

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these swimsuits for my daughters. I was very happy with my purchase when I received these. These swimsuits are super cute. Unfortunately after a few normal wears the plastic ring connecting the strap to the swimsuit broke and was not reparable. This happened to two out of three of the suits I bought. The third one has not been worn as much so I am assuming it will happen to that one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to my daughter. It looked the great, bright fit as expected perfectly. After 1.5 mounth ( about14 uses) I noticed it had faded to a green color. And now it become bigger. It is not normal at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Voronenko

customer_reviews.title: Cute, run small
customer_reviews.text: I let my daughter pick out which she wanted and this is the one she chose. She 8 years old and average size. I know how things run small so I ordered up in hopes it would fit her but might be a tad big so it could fit her next year as well since it was towards the end of summer. It runs pretty small. I wish I would have ordered two sizes up. The material is great and it’s a really cute suit but I would suggest to definitely order a size up. I got a size 10/12 and it just fit.
customer_reviews.author: Marie M. Christen

customer_reviews.title: darling suit
customer_reviews.text: The Girls One Piece Hawaiian Ruffle Swimwear Beach Bathing Suit is an adorable suit. However, it does run on the short side through the body. It had to be returned for a larger size, which is why only four stars. The larger size is a little loose width wise, but perfectly comfortable length wise. If you need a suit for a tall or long waisted child I suggest ordering up a size. The colors are bright, the suit appears to be well made, and it came when promised.
customer_reviews.author: Edie Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time to pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this suit for my daughter’s Easter basket. We live in Idaho so we finally were able to go to the pool and it broke before she even made it to the pool the first time. We are outside the rerun window and believe for the price, it shouldn’t have done this. Very unhappy!! Hoping to hear from seller.
customer_reviews.author: stephanieb

customer_reviews.title: Great way to prevent sunburn
customer_reviews.text: We bought this swimsuit for my daughter for a trip to a water park. We live in Texas where the sun is very strong, and it is difficult to prevent your skin from burning when you spend an entire day outside in the summer. This suit is super cute and provides great coverage for the upper body. No sunburnt shoulders! I washed it and it still looks great. Would definitely recommend, we are happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Callanan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Well Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 12 for my 12 yr old daughter and it fits perfectly. Had a hard time finding one that had rear coverage and this one does the job! Looks super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: To big
customer_reviews.text: It seems well made but the straps are adjustable but only by so much. The top is low cut and barely covers my daughters chest, she’s only 5 but I still don’t want people at the public pool seeing her chest. I bought her normal size but the straps are already as tight as they can go and the straps slip off her shoulders. I’m afraid if I size down it will be too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: I have literally NEVER LOVED a bathing suit as much as I love these. I by two of the same suits for girls because they wear them out. Living in Florida you really need to protect your skin from the sun but you must be comfortable too. These fit great. For the body length and arms. I don’t have to chase them down for sun screen as often because now it’s just on their face and legs!
customer_reviews.author: Shoup

customer_reviews.title: I liked it but...
customer_reviews.text: Great swimsuit. Beautiful and fits perfectly. Faded fast though. My daughter has only had it for a week and it's already faded. Our other children are swimming in the same pool and their suits are just fine, so it's the suit and not the pool. Super disappointed because I spent $20 on a suit and now we need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suit. Perfect for the price. Really cute and sporty. It fit but if I ordered it again then I would order a size bigger so that it would last longer. My daughter likes that the zipper is in the front and that it is easier to do herself (some of the other suits have the zipper in the back).
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Lynn Morelli

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Going to wash on cold and hang dry. Going to an event at a hotel in winter and baby outgrew summer suit. She is 22 months and wears a 4-5t. I bought the 4-5 year old suit and fits good. Now where to find swimmy diapers in fall.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ganley

customer_reviews.title: One piece swimsuit with adjustable straps!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old needed a new suit and this is super cute on her! Love how easy the straps were to adjust so it was high enough between her neck and chest. Washed and air dried perfectly. Only used once so far for swin lessons but very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Color faded away quickly
customer_reviews.text: It fits nice but the color fade away after a couple of washes.
customer_reviews.author: sdmish

customer_reviews.title: Great for girls with shorter torsos and wider hips/legs
customer_reviews.text: Very adorable bathing suit and good quality. It’s unfortunately made for a child who has bigger hips and thighs and shorter torso than my daughter. The suit pulls at the torso despite the adjustable straps but the slots for the legs are baggy so I can’t size up. For the record, my 4 year old is the height of a 6 year old but can still fit in 3T around the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye, RD

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love that the back of this suit comes up to just under the shoulder blades so that they stay put rather than her constantly fighting with them to stay up. The leg holes are also cut very modestly keeping the suit from giving her a wedgie as she plays in the water. My 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an 11 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an 11 year old. My granddaughter loved this swimsuit and it looks beautiful on her. A perfect fit and vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: noel

customer_reviews.title: Awkward Fit
customer_reviews.text: Although this suit is cute, the cut lays a little awkward on my petite 24 lb 3 year old. The 3T size sags on the bottom, but somehow covers adequately at the same time. I'm not a fan of the top bikini cut, but it's a small dislike. I like it well enough to keep, but not well enough to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Cee

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute bathing suit! My little one got so many compliments from other parents. I would definitely buy again and recommend. The material is great and it’s a great price!
customer_reviews.author: OhMy_Grace

customer_reviews.title: Color changed completely after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is really cute but after a couple of times wearing it and washing it the colors changed completely - instead of being dark green and orange it is now grey and pink.... not thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Susan CS

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bathing suite
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this same bathing suit because I love it so much! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Swim suit
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is awesome. I never knew they made them with long sleeves. My daughter breaks out from the sunand this swimsuit helps so much!!! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T HOLD THE COLOR
customer_reviews.text: This suit faded terribly after only wearing it in fresh water 4 times. As we are getting close to end of the season and the color has faded to an unrecognizable level. The suit looks like it is a hand me down from two previous wearers. It has only been washed by hand with woolite and dried on a hanger. I wouldn't put it on my Granddaughter to go swimming at a friends house.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful swim wear
customer_reviews.text: The fabric & construction is on point. Sturdy enough to last a couple summers. You can’t see through them, think enough to be comfortable wearing.
customer_reviews.author: eve Bean

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: This suit was so bright & cute my niece just loved it !! It was absolutely true to the size we expected & it met expectations exactly !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, especially around legs.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old adores this swim suit. The elstoc at the legs is not too tight an fits not loose either. It's easy for her to put on herself.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Fits as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Had just received it today. Definitely a very cute and good quality. Fits perfect for my 2 y.o. She is on a bit taller side but the shoulder straps are adjustable and it works out perfectly! Might even fit her next year, we will see. Colors are so bright and pretty too 😍
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Suit is beautifully well made, fit is flattering, and adjustable straps allow for perfect comfort! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Magazine EIC

customer_reviews.title: All around great suit
customer_reviews.text: Great suit, straps adjust nicely and stay put. Very pleased with this seller and purchase all the way around. Ordered a 9/10, so that it’ll fit through the summer, and it has some give but can be tightened up with the adjustable straps. Crotch covers completely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fades fast and hard
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for one month then it started to fade worth about 3-4x a week use. I bought a different one (other brand) for myself at the same time as I bought this for my daughter. My daughter's was gorgeous at first but started to fade in two weeks. First I thought I was imagining it, but now it's pretty obvious there's something wrong here. For the price this was not intended to be a throwaway swimsuit. It's faded and pilling and has lost its stretch. No, I don't use a washer and dryer. It's rinsed by hand after the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Henna Haroon

customer_reviews.title: So so cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this swimsuit. Easy to put on, stays up with the crossed straps, really cute with the ruffles and flowers. Good coverage. This is the second summer we've gotten this one and we'll keep buying them each year until she sizes out of them!
customer_reviews.author: kaliipzo

customer_reviews.title: So insanely cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute swimsuit! My daughter loves the pink ruffles. The straps are slightly confusing to put on but crisscross backs always are -_-! The colors have remained vibrant, the ruffles are as pictured and it's already held up to multiple washes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kotzan

customer_reviews.title: Broke pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: Swimsuit was cute, but the straps broke within the first week of wear. We swim fairly regularly during the summer and didn't have time to be without so I ended up sewing the straps myself instead of sending it back. It's an adorable pattern and other than that issue it is working well
customer_reviews.author: 2parents7kids

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality-Super cute print and style
customer_reviews.text: Suit is even better in person. Bought a size 13-14 for my almost 13 year old daughter. It has a little room to move and grow which is what I was hoping for but still able to wear comfortably now. Material is thick and soft. The patriotic print is just as pictured and looks great! Ruffles are conveniently placed to cover budding breasts and help her not to feel self conscious. So happy with the quality that we ordered another one in a different print.
customer_reviews.author: b.c.

customer_reviews.title: So cute, age appropriate, true to size
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute, age-appropriate fit for my 10 year old! It seems to be good quality material. I love the adjustable straps. She has another suit that fits well otherwise, but the straps rub. I wish that one had this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica from AR

customer_reviews.title: This is a cute swim suit. As others have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute swim suit. As others have said, the leg holes are large. But my daughter wears a swim diaper so it isn't a big deal. The front is a little lower than I would have expected for a little girls' suit. But overall it is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Barlow

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a bit taller so I made sure to size up for her and it fit perfectly. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bathing suit for my daughter. She’s a big doin to be 3 year old. 43 inches tall and about 44 pounds. The 5-6 year fit perfectly. She normally wears a 5-6 in clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O'C

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size 6-7 for my daughter that just turned 7 a month ago and it fit perfect. The colors are exactly as pictured. If I had bought the 7-8 more than likely it would have been too big. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: I found the suit to be true to size
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is a big 4 year old, wearing size 5. I got her the size 5/6 and it fits with a little growing room, so perfect! She will be able to wear it again next summer. Very cute and well made. And it came a lot sooner than they said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Vallejos

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This faded horribly. After wearing it 3 times it was so faded and unsightly we couldn’t wear it in public.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: One season use
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers are right. This is a cute swimsuit but not well made. On first use, one strap started to come undone. Two months in and the other strap is also coming undone, and this is our back-swimsuit, so it doesn’t get used as much. Oh well...good thing my 3 year old is growing like a weed so this is a one season purchase.
customer_reviews.author: baldor1

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and flattering
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little suit for my 8 year old who is closer to the size of a 9 or 10 year old. Very flattering and comfy, we both love it!
customer_reviews.author: M Penhall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My average sized 5 yo fit just perfect in this and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Cute on!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loves this style so much 3 of them in different colors & patterns! They wash well, dry quickly & the straps are easy to adjust. My reason for 4 stars is that this particular color faded after being worn & washed twice.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic1321

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up to a full summer
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old daughter has been wearing this swimsuit less than two months. It's faded on the outside, yellowing on the inside, and the plastic ring that holds one of the straps has broken. Is it a super cute swimsuit? Yes. Is it made well enough to last an entire summer? Absolutely not.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful suit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this suit but even with adjustable straps it’s a little tight. I’m afraid when I adjust the straps that it will lower the top and it will be too low for her chest. She is a tall 8 year old but slender I got a size 9-10.
customer_reviews.author: jsjh

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for 5 year old granddaughter & is her favorite. Held up through beach vacation & swimming lessons!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nute

customer_reviews.title: Size Problem...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made suit even cuter than shown. My Granddaughter age 7 usually takes a size 7-8 in most everything. I did have to exchange for a 10-12. It is just a tad large but has growing room. Love this suit on her. The straps being adjustable are a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA

customer_reviews.title: Cute and colorful
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this. It’s very cute and pretty. I’m curios to headroom how it holds up, but a very good first impression!
customer_reviews.author: arteest

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely adores this swim suit! She's highly picky and cant stand anything too girly and this suit meet her rather high standards - plus the straps are adjustable so she'll be able to grow with it 😍
customer_reviews.author: MommaR

customer_reviews.title: This suit is just as pictured, but what you can't see is how nicely it's made.
customer_reviews.text: This suit is very cute. It's just like the picture. The fabric is very nice and it's very nicely made. Very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: F. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 4/5 for my 4 year old. I usually purchase clothes in a size bigger because shes taller and this works perfect. Great quality and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: SarahC

customer_reviews.title: The zipper broke on the first wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in preparation for our pool that was being built the pool is ready and my daughter put the suit on. Two teeth of the zipper broke off. Now the suit cannot be used.
customer_reviews.author: littleredhairedgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Ill-fitting and cheap. Runs very large and then started stretching out and fading in color after one or two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors. It's darling and my granddaughter wants to wear it all day long!! I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: bignlilski

customer_reviews.title: Modest but trendy, adjustable straps!
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors, very pretty. Modest but still trendy. Bought one for my toddler and my 8yr old loved it too and now wants the same one. Adjustable straps! Awesome! Didn't realize this when I bought it, happily surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but it faded, and I mean COMPLETELY washed out after just two days at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color & adjustable stripes
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love these swimsuits! Their color are just beautiful! The stripes are adjustable and perfect coverage for my 4 & 5 year old daughters (they are true to size!)
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and size fits perfect. The print is so much cuter in person. My 7 year old loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, color and material!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing suit! Very high quality with nice stitching and material. Does not stretch out and the color has held up in the ocean and chlorine pool. Will be buying more! Ordered the size 10 for my 7 year old- sized up one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color too neon and leg holes too large
customer_reviews.text: I chose the blue color for my 5-year-old daughter, but the color was nothing like the one shown. The frills look light pink online, but it is hot neon pink that makes it tacky-looking. I see now some of the pictures other customers have taken, and I wish I had taken a look before making my purchase. The leg holes are too large and not elastic at all so for my daughter's thin legs, there are wide gaps between the swimsuit and her legs. It looks awkward. Now I'm regretting buying a swimsuit online.
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: Super Wedgey
customer_reviews.text: My daughters has deep cut thighs so it's always in her butt and I get to watch her pick the wedgey. And it's loose in the front... Not even going to describe that.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke in a week
customer_reviews.text: The straps arent sewn to the swimsuit. There is a plastic ring that the strap is hooked to and sewn back on to the strap. It broke within one week of my daughter having it. Then the piece that sinches the straps to fit broke too! The suit is super cute so it was super disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Whetsell

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit, fits true to size. After several pool uses, color has stayed bright. Would purchase again for this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: We ordered 2 and one fit
customer_reviews.text: It has a little more ruffles than expected and the pink was more bright orange. It is overall super cute. It fit one daughter fine, and the other was more skimpy on the bottom. We kept one and returned the other.
customer_reviews.author: B. temple

customer_reviews.title: Ratio of sizing is wrong!
customer_reviews.text: The details of this swimsuit were set for a 3-4 yr. old. My daughter is 3 1/2. The swimsuit fit lengthwise (from shoulders to bottom), but the bodice was way too large. You could pull the swimsuit away from her back about 4 inches. No offense, but it seemed like it was made for an extremely chubby child who was the same height. It's a bummer because it was really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Cervantez

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and look. My daughter loved itfor our trip Hawaii. Well made as well!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Starling Norman

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and it fits her well. Can't ask for anything better than that!
customer_reviews.author: P. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Return policy stinks
customer_reviews.text: The suit is fine. I bought it in March for my granddaughter for Easter, which was April 23rd this year. After giving it to her, we found out it was too small. I didn’t realize the return window had already closed before I even gave it to her. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her new swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Overall the suit fits really nice, but the sleeves seem to be a little short. We love the bright colors and the sun protection! Perfect for a day at the beach!!
customer_reviews.author: Akajt98

customer_reviews.title: It it too cute! And, my grandaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It has only been used once, so I don't know how long it will last. But it is true to size and put together well so I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!! Read reviews for sizing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This suit was perfect for my slim build almost 8 year old! She loved it for the beach last week!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and has held up in the wash
customer_reviews.text: Colorful. Easy to wear. Has not stretched out or torn even after many swims and washes. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer W

customer_reviews.title: Very comfort and vibrant!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this bathing suit. The for was perfect. The fabric was so soft and comfy and the colors were vibrant! I would definitely buy this product again. The only thing that may prevent me from purchasing again I'd knowing whether the product was produced with fair trade companies. I don't care how much I like a product, if I found out the origins of it were unethical I would not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Good swimsuit however a little the chest area is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good swimsuit however a little the chest area is a little awkward. Not sure how to describe it but it’s not snug against the chest like I would like a swimsuit to be on my daughter. Maybe she has a longer torso? Not sure. Overall good though.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bathing suit, she said it fits great and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ripp
